title: Regenerative Endodontic Procedures (REPs) Training: Remote Project Learning Based on the 4C-ID Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Dental Knowledge and Understanding of Fundamental Root Canal Treatment Procedures
context.additional_context: Remote education conducted in a digitally supported environment, emphasizing project-based learning with real clinical scenarios and peer assessment

learning_goals: The theoretical background of regenerative endodontic procedures (REPs) can be described, and three or more step-by-step protocols can be listed.
Problem-solving skills to apply REPs in real clinical scenarios are developed through case analysis based on the 4C-ID model.
Technical procedures of regenerative endodontic treatment are performed with 95% accuracy in a simulated environment through Project-Based Learning (PBL).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
